item.title: 49. Group Anagrams
item.description: LeetCode problem Given an array of strings strs, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order. An Anagram is a word or phrase formed by rearranging the letters of a different word or phrase, typically using all the original letters exactly once. Example 1: Input: strs = ["eat","tea","tan","ate","nat","bat"] Output: [["bat"],["nat","tan"],["ate","eat","tea"]] Example 2: Input: strs = [""] Output: [[""]] Example 3: Input: strs = ["a"] Output: [["a"]] Idea: 1class Solution: 2 def groupAnagrams(self, strs: List[str]) -> List[List[str]]: 3 dd = {} 4 for s in strs: 5 s_sort = "".
